class_notes:
(Same as FILM 265 1)
(This course will provide an overview of the modern Iranian society through its cinema, especially in the last 40 years of post-revolutionary Iran.  The course will cover 13 topics: Iranian Society and Cinema; Diversity; Rural Life; Nomads; Revolution; War; Women and Gender Issues; Family and Relationships; Class Conflict; Morality; Education; Immigration; Forbidden Life. In addition to reading articles and book excerpts on these issues, we will watch as many films as possible to see how these topics are reflected in the cinema as one of the major media of depicting and analyzing social, political, and intellectual life in the modern world.)
